CustomField.description: This field identifies the class to be used when creating a Application Event Logger, which can be dynamically loaded and instantiated using the rflib_LoggerUtil.getApplicationEventLogger() method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please provide the name of the Apex class implementing the rflib_ApplicationEventLogger interface. This class will be dynamically instantiated and used in your Apex code. Please use caution when changing the default value.
CustomField.label: Application Event Logger Class Name
